name: Name
delete_practice_warning: Are you sure you want to delete? Any logged data associated with this practice will be lost.
delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete?
is_required_memo: If a practice is required and hasn't been filled in for a past date, a red dot will appear next to that date in the calendar.
signup_email_sent: Please check your emails. You should get one from us with a link to continue registration.
reset_email_sent: Please check your emails. You should get one from us with a link to reset your password.
login_not_found: Could not find user with email {email}
invalid_reset_link: Invalid or expired password reset link
user_already_exists: User with email {email} already exists. Please log in or reset password.
reset_success_alert: Password has been successfully reset. Please login.
import_instructions_body:
* First column must be a date in format YYYY-MM-DD (eg 2022-02-24 for 24 Feb 2024)
* The file must be coma separated, optionally quoted
* The first row must have column names (header)
* Your data will be overwritten (including with empty value)
* It stops processing a row if it can't parse a single value in the row
* Checkbox column should have 'true' or 'false' value or be empty
import_discovered_columns_memo: These columns have been matched with your practices
import_unmatched_columns_memo: These columns could not be matched with your practices and can't be imported.
yatra_delete_member_confirmation: Please confirm deletion of a member
yatra_heatmap_memo_p1: Enables 7 day trend column in the day grid and the stability heatmap.
yatra_heatmap_memo_p2: The Stability Heatmap highlights patterns of steadiness over the past two weeks. Colors are based on a 7-day moving average, so they reflect overall consistency rather than single good or difficult days.
yatra_heatmap_memo_p3: Apart from this flag you need to set up mandatory and bonus thresholds in yatra practices' settings.
yatra_blank_msg: You are not part of any yatra. Please create a new one or ask someone to invite you into an existing one.
yatra_mapping_info: Choose your personal practices from the dropdowns to match the yatra practices. Leave blank to skip.
yatra_delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete yatra? This operation cannot be undone.
yatra_delete_practice_warning: Are you sure you want to delete practice?
yatra_leave_warning: Are you sure you want to leave yatra?
yatra_already_joined: You have already joined this yatra
yatra_last_admin_cannot_leave: Last yatra admin can't leave. Add another admin or delete yatra instead.
daily_score_memo: Daily Score reflects how well a person completed sadhana for a particular day. It consists of mandatory points and optional bonus points. Bonus points only count if all mandatory practices are completed. It's used to show the 7 day trend column and the stability heatmap.
daily_score_mandatory_memo: Reaching this threshold adds 1 point to the daily score
daily_score_bonus_memo: Reaching this threshold adds an extra point to the daily score. Bonus points are ignored if not all the mandatory thresholds are met.
colour_zones_description: Colour zones make the yatra table more visual by painting each value cell red, green, or yellow depending on the value.
colour_zones_preview_description: Shows how a cell value will look in the yatra grid
colour_zones_must_be_greater: Value must be greater than previous bound
colour_zones_new_practice_how_to_memo: You can add colour zones to this practice by editing it once created
report_delete_confirmation_msg: Are you sure you want to delete the report?
help_registration: How to register a new user
help_ios_web_app: How to install sadhana.pro as a web app on iOS
help_add_practice: How to add a new practice
help_add_graph_report: How to add a new report with charts
help_graph_show_avg: How to display average on a graphic report
help_graph_add_practice: How to add multiple practices to a graphic report
help_graph_bar_chart_layouts: How to change bar chart layout
help_add_table_report: How to add a new report with a table
prompt_desc_add_dur: Enter how many minutes to add to {practice_name}
